comments.author: Just a normal person
comments.text: Omg! i just accepted my mother in law yesterday without thinking they will see all previous post.

comments.author: A stranger
comments.text: If you want to avoid that, don't post anything on Facebook.

photos.title: Twitter definition
photos.text: Twitter is where people come to say things they don't want their family to see on Facebook.

photos.title: Backup, backup everywher
photos.text: So sad to find that all 4,000+ photos from my old iPhone are lost - I was praying some smart IT type had set them up for iCloud backup
